level.text: Proof of service, stating the name and address of the person on whom service is made and the manner and date of service, may be shown by any of the following methods:
Written acknowledgement by the person served or by his or her representative;
The certificate of the person performing service or that person’s representative or attorney; or
A return receipt if service is made by registered or certified mail.
Documents required or permitted to be filed under this chapter shall be served on the same date the document is filed with the Office.
